amendment.description: To require the Federal Aviation Administration to coordinate with the Center of Excellence for Unmanned Aircraft Systems with respect to research relating to unmanned aircraft systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3567 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3567 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Cochran to Amendment SA 3464. (consideration: CR S1876-1878; text: CR S1878) To require the Federal Aviation Administration to coordinate with the Center of Excellence for Unmanned Aircraft Systems with respect to research relating to unmanned aircraft systems.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3567 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3567 proposed by Senator Thune for Senator Cochran to Amendment SA 3464.
